bill.summary:
Preserving America's Infrastructure Dollars Act of 2018 or the PAID Act of 2018
This bill requires the Department of Transportation to require each state to conduct a life-cycle cost analysis for each project of the state that: (1) receives federal highway financial assistancee; and (2) has an estimated total cost of $30 million or more.
